items.comment: Part A 1 (a)-  List the applicant's full legal name.  The full legal name means an individual's first name, middle name, and last name without the use of initials or a nickname.

items.name: $ Amount
items.comment: Part A 1. (b)   Enter the dollar amount of the emergency loan that you are requesting.

items.name: Loan Purpose
items.comment: Part A 1. (c)  List the specific purpose(s) for which loan proceeds will be used.  i.e. operating expenses, replacing damaged buildings, etc.

items.name: Applicant's Signature
items.comment: Part A 2.   Enter the applicant's signature. A signature is a distinctive way as a form of identification on a document, to authorize one's true certification.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Part A 3.   Enter the specific month, date and year the applicant has completed and signed the form.

items.name: Principal Balance
items.comment: Part B 1. A.   List the amount still owed on the original debt financed without any interest or finance charges that are due as of the date the form has been completed.  .

items.name: Accrued Interest
items.comment: Part B 1. B.   List the amount of interest that has been incurred/computed as of a specific accounting date that has not been paid as of the date the form has been completed.

items.name: As of Date
items.comment: Part B 1. C.   Enter the date used to compute the principal balance and the amount of accrued interest for this debt.

items.name: Amount Delinquent
items.comment: Part B 1. D.   List the dollar amount past due, which refers to a payment that has not been made by the deadline.

items.name: Annual Installment
items.comment: Part B 1. E.   Enter the annual installment amount for each debt listed.

items.name: Interest Rate
items.comment: Part B 1. F.   Enter the annual effective simple interest rate for each debt listed.  Insert a "*" if the account has a variable rate.

items.name: Daily Interest Accrual
items.comment: Part B 1. G.   List the daily dollar amount of interest added to the account balance.

items.name: Maturity Date
items.comment: Part B 1. H.   List the date which the final payment is due on the loan or account being verified.

items.name: Loan Continuation Question
items.comment: Part B 2.   Check the "YES" box if you are willing to continue with the borrower's debts and describe in Item 2. A. under what conditions are you willing to continue.    Check "NO" if you are not willing to continue with the debts and describe in Item 2. B. the reasons why you are not willing to continue.  Use Item 7, Remarks, for additional space to complete your answer.

items.name: If Yes
items.comment: Part B 2. A.   If you are willing to continue with the borrower's debt describe what conditions are required.

items.name: If No
items.comment: Part B 2.B.   If you have checked "NO" describe why you are not willing to continue with the borrower.

items.name: Collateral Description
items.comment: Part B 3.   Describe the collateral securing the debt(s) listed in Item B1. of each account.  (General descriptions may be used, i.e.., machinery and equipment, land, cattle, sheep, goats, etc.)

items.name: Similar Loan Question
items.comment: Part B 4.   Check the "YES" box if the applicant has applied for a loan of similar amount and purposes as that requested from FSA.  If "YES" is checked complete items 4. A through 4. F.    If you have not received a similar loan request, check the "NO" box.

items.name: Amount
items.comment: Part B 4. A.   Enter the amount of loan that has been requested.

items.name: Interest Rate
items.comment: Part B 4. B.   Enter the interest rate for this loan request.

items.name: Terms
items.comment: Part B 4. C.   Enter the terms for the loan requested. Please note whether it is a revolving line of credit or a one year note.

items.name: Date of Last Request
items.comment: Part B 4. D.  Enter the specific date of the loan request.  Include month, day and year.

items.name: Purpose
items.comment: Part B 4. E. Enter the purpose(s) for the loan requested.

items.name: Collateral Offered
items.comment: Part B 4. F.   Enter the collateral offered for this loan request.

items.name: Applicant Request Approval Question
items.comment: Part B 5.   Check "YES" if the applicant's loan request was approved.     If "YES" is checked complete Part B 5. A.  If "NO" is checked complete Part B 5. B.

items.name: Amount
items.comment: Part B 5. A.   Enter the amount of the approved loan.

items.name: Reason for Loan Denial
items.comment: Part B 5. B.   Enter the reason the loan request was not approved.

items.name: FSA Guaranteed Loan Question
items.comment: Part B 6.   Check "YES" if you would consider making the applicant a loan with an FSA Guarantee.    If "NO" is checked, indicate the reason in Part B 7.

items.name: Remarks
items.comment: Part B 7.   Use this space to add any additional pertinent information.

items.name: Name and Address of Lender
items.comment: Part C 1.   Enter the name of the lender's representative, the institution, and the address of the institution providing this information.

items.name: Title of Lender's Representative
items.comment: Part C 2.   Enter the title of the lender's representative signing this form.

items.name: Signature of Lender's Representative
items.comment: Part C 3.   Enter the signature of the lender's representative completing this form.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Part C 4.   Enter the date this form is signed.

Forms.name: FSA-2314 Streamlined Request for Direct OL Assistance
Forms.file_name: FSA 2314 Streamlined Request for Direct OL assistance with comments.pdf
Forms.description: This application is to be used only by those applicants who are requesting an annual operational loan and qualify for Streamlined OL Assistance, as outlined in Direct Loan Making Handbook 3-FLP.

items.name: Exact Full Legal Name
items.comment: EXACT FULL LEGAL name.  As shown as the proof of Identification (I.E. Driver's license/State ID). Additional information will need to be provided to show the full legal name.

items.name: Mailing Address
items.comment: Enter the applicant's complete mailing address.  If applicant is an entity enter the main address where correspondence should be sent.

items.name: Contact Information
items.comment: In Part A 3A, 3B and 3C enter the applicant's phone number(s) and e-mail address.

items.name: Loan Purpose
items.comment: Select all that apply.

items.name: Loan Amount
items.comment: Enter the amount of each type of operating loan that is being requested.

items.name: Yes/No Question #1
items.comment: Check "YES". If you have made significant changes to the operation since you submitted your last Annual Operating loan request. Insert the date of the last Operating Loan application.  If "YES" proved details in Item 7, otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #2
items.comment: Check "YES" If you or any member of the entity is delinquent on an federal debt (i.e. "Federal Debt" includes but is not limited to education loans, delinquent taxes, obligations at Natural Resources Conservation Service, obligations to GCIC, etc.).  If "YES" provide details in Item 7 otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #3
items.comment: Check "YES" if you or any member of the entity or the entity itself is involved in any pending litigation.  If "YES" provide details in Item 7 otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #4
items.comment: Check "YES" if you or any member of the entity has ever been in receivership, been discharged, or filed a petition for reorganization in bankruptcy.  If "YES" provide details in Item 7, otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #5
items.comment: Check "YES" if you are an employee, related to an employee, or closely associated with an employee of the Farm Service Agency.  If not, check "NO".  If "YES", provide details in Item 7.

items.name: Yes/No Question #6
items.comment: Check "YES" if there have been any changes to annual income for you or any member of the entity since your last application with FSA.  If "YES" provide details in Item 7, otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Additional Answers
items.comment: Provide explanations to any "YES" responses for Items 1-6.  Use additional pages if necessary.

items.name: Statements and Certifications
items.comment: Read statements and certifications in items 8 - 15.

items.name: Applicant Initials
items.comment: Applicant's intitials.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Enter the specific month, date and year the applicant completed the application form.

items.name: Applicant Initials
items.comment: Applicant's initials.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Enter the specific month, date and year the applicant completed the application form.

items.name: Applicant/Authorized Entity Representative Signature
items.comment: Enter the signature of the individual applicant or the authorized entity representatives.  For entity members, all members should sign as individuals in Items 16- 19.

items.name: Entity Representative Title
items.comment: Enter the Title and/or Relationship of the person signing the application.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Enter the signature of the entity member.  For entity members, all members should sign as individuals in Items 16-19.

items.name: Date Form FSA-2314 Received
items.comment: Enter the date the FSA-2314 was received in the office.

items.name: Date Application Complete
items.comment: Enter the date the application was considered complete.

items.name: Credit Report Fee
items.comment: Enter the amount of the credit report fee received.

items.name: Date Received
items.comment: Enter the date the credit report is received.

items.name: Name of Agency Official
items.comment: Enter the name of the Agency Official receiving the application and/or credit report fee.

Forms.name: FSA-2330 Request for Microloan Assistance
Forms.description: All applicants must complete Part A. Individual applicants complete Parts B, D, F and G. Two or more persons applying jointly, including married persons, are considered an entity. Entities must complete Parts C, D, F and G. Entity members must use the sheets provided on Part E. Non-citizen nationals and qualified aliens must provide appropriate documentation under Federal immigration law. *Race, ethnicity, and gender information is requested by the Federal Government to monitor FSA's compliance with Federal laws prohibiting discrimination against applicants. Applicants are not required to furnish this information but are encouraged to do so. Failure to provide this information may result in not receiving targeted funds for which the applicant may be eligible. One or more boxes may be selected for race. This information will not be used to evaluate the application. FSA is required to note race, ethnicity and gender on the basis of observer identification if you do not furnish it.

items.name: Exact Full Legal Name
items.comment: Part A 1:  List the applicants full legal name.  The full legal name means an individual's first name, middle name, and last name without the use of initials or a nickname.

items.name: Address
items.comment: Part A 2:  List the applicants mailing address location.  This will include the name of the registered street, the town/city and state.

items.name: Phone Numbers
items.comment: Part 3 A-B:  Enter the applicant's home (landline), cell and/or business telephone number, as applicable.  Indicate cosigner's best contact telephone number by selecting "Primary" in the applicable box.

items.name: Email Address
items.comment: Part A 3(C):  Enter the applicant's e-mail address.

items.name: Social Security Number
items.comment: Part B 1:  Enter the applicant's social security number (9 digit number).

items.name: Birth Date
items.comment: Part B 2:  Enter the applicant's date of birth.

items.name: County of Operation Headquarters
items.comment: Part B 3:   Enter the county where the applicant's farming headquarters is located.  County where your farming headquarters is VS Where the majority of your farming operation is?   Match the Farm Program Records. Typically, the homestead is used as headquarters.   Farmers will also use where the majority of the operation is.

items.name: Veteran Status
items.comment: Part B 4:  This will not automatically determine whether the applicant is qualified or approved.   Veteran - anyone who has served in the U.S. armed services.   Explain what a veteran is. Veteran Status does not equal military experience

items.name: Marital Status
items.comment: Part B 5:  Check the appropriate box depending on whether the applicant is unmarried, separated, or married applying as an individual.

items.name: Citizen Question
items.comment: Part B 6:  Check the applicable citizenship status.  If non-citizen national, qualified alien, or refugee, as defined by the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996, 8 U.S. C. 1641, applicant must provide copies of appropriate documentation of immigration status including and not limited, to a current I-551, Naturalization Certificate, or I688B.  Other than U.S. Citizen, please provide documentation to document immigration status.

items.name: Ethnicity
items.comment: Part B 7:   Providing applicant's ethnicity is voluntary; however, if applying as a socially disadvantaged applicant based on ethnicity, this information is required.  Check the "I prefer not to share" box if you choose not to share any information related to ethnicity

items.name: Race
items.comment: Part B 8:  Race:   Check the appropriate box indicating applicant's race.  More than one box may be checked.  Providing applicant's race is voluntary; however, if applying as a socially disadvantaged applicant based on race, this information is required.  Check the "I prefer not to share" box if you choose not to share any information related to race

items.name: Gender
items.comment: Part B 9:   Providing applicant's gender is voluntary; however, if applying as a socially disadvantaged applicant based on gender, this information is required.   Non- Binary is defined as an individual who identifies as neither male or female.  Check the "I prefer not to share" box if you choose not to share any information related to gender.

parts.name: Part C
parts.title: Entity Applicant Information
parts.description: NOTE: Individual liability will be required regardless of the entity type. Informal entities may leave Items 2 through 4 blank, if not applicable. By signing in Part E you certify that you have read and understand the statements and certifications on Pages 4 through 6. Balance Sheet provided in Part E for entity member use.

items.name: Entity Type
items.comment: Part C1:  Please provide documentation to support the  entity type chosen.   An entity is an organization created by an individual or individuals to conduct business under an assigned identification number.

items.name: State of Registration
items.comment: Part C 2:   Enter the state where the entity is registered.

items.name: Registration Number
items.comment: Part C 3:  The registration ID number is the unique identification number assigned to the entity. The registration ID number is not the same as a SSN or Federal EIN. Please enter the registration ID from the entity agreement

items.name: Tax Identification Number
items.comment: Part C 4:  Enter the applicant's personal tax ID number. It is an identifying number for taxes purposes. This could be a social security number or EIN number depending on the type of entity.

items.name: Exact Full Legal Name of Primary Entity Contact
items.comment: Part C 5:  List the primary entity contact's full legal name.  The full legal name means an individual's first name, middle name, and last name without the use of initials or a nickname.

items.name: Embedded Entity Question
items.comment: Part C 6:  Check "YES" if the Entity contains an embedded entity.  Check "NO" if the Entity does not contain an embedded entity.  Embedded entity means an entity that has a direct or indirect interest as a stockholder, member, beneficiary, or otherwise another entity.

items.name: List all Embedded Entities
items.comment: Part C 7:  Please list all entities that you are a member of, beneficiary of, or part of.

items.name: Percentage of Interest
items.comment: Part C 8:  Each member must list the percentage owned in the entity (entities).

items.name: Number of Entity Members
items.comment: Part C 9:   Enter the number of individuals that make up  the entity. This must match your entity agreement. If changes have been made, the entity agreement needs to be legally updated.

items.name: Initials
items.comment: Enter applicant's initials.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Date the applicant completed this form.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

parts.name: Part D
parts.title: Financial Statements for Individual or Entity Applicant

items.name: Income Description
items.comment: Part D 1(A):  List in detail: each crop to be grown, number of acres per crop, projected yield per crop and enter income per crop in column B. Also, List in detail: type of livestock, number of livestock to be sold and enter income in column B.

items.name: Total Annual Farm Income
items.comment: Part D 2:  Enter total income from items listed in column 1 B.

items.name: Expense Amount
items.comment: Part D 3 (B):  List dollar amount of each expense for the projected operation above.

items.name: Total Annual Farm Expenses
items.comment: Part D 4:  Enter total expenses from item 3.

items.name: Net Farm Income
items.comment: Part D 5:  Subtract total farm expenses from your gross farm income.

items.name: Total Annual Non-Farm Income
items.comment: Part D 6:  Total income generated from off farm sources. Examples include wages, non-farm rental income, child support, off farm distribution sales, etc.

items.name: Total Annual Family Living Expenses
items.comment: Part D 7:  A breakdown of the total amount needed to cover general family living expenses

items.name: Net Non-Farm Income
items.comment: Part D 8:  Subtract total non-farm expenses from your gross non-farm income.

items.name: Net Total Annual Income
items.comment: Part D 9:  Total income from farm and non-farm income sources.

items.name: Assets and Debts As Of Date
items.comment: Part D Date:  Effective date is the date you are completing this form.

items.name: Asset Description
items.comment: Part D 3 (A10):  An asset is an item that has value. Ex: crops, machinery, vehicles, livestock, real estate.

items.name: Total Asset Value
items.comment: Part D 3 (A11): Total value of all assets listed under 10B "$VALUE".

items.name: Debt Description
items.comment: Part D 3 (A12): A debt is money owed to others. Include personal and farm related debts.

items.name: Total Debt Value
items.comment: Part D 3 (A13):  Total of money owed listed in 12C "$BALANCE".

items.name: Total Assets from Item 11
items.comment: Part D 3 (A14):  Total value of all assets listed under 11.

items.name: Total Debts from Item 13
items.comment: Part D 3 (A15):  Total of money owed listed in 13.

items.name: Net Worth
items.comment: Part D 3 (A16):  Value of total assets minus the total of all liabilities.

items.name: Initials
items.comment: Enter applicant's initials.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Date the applicant completed this form.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

parts.name: Part E
parts.title: Individual Entity Member Information
parts.description: Instructions: Two or more persons, including married persons, who are applying jointly and do not have an entity name or Tax ID Number, will be considered a joint operation. In Part C, married persons applying jointly check the Joint Operation box. Complete Items 1A through 1I for each entity member. *Items 1K through 1M are voluntary. Provide balance sheet information for each entity member. Signature and Date blocks below must be completed for all entity members. Use separate Part E pages for each entity member.  NOTE: Individual liability will be required regardless of the entity type. By signing below in Item 9 you certify that you have read and understand the statements and certifications on Pages 4 through 6

items.name: Initials
items.comment: Enter applicant's initials.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Date the applicant completed this form.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Counties Being Farmed
items.comment: Part F 1:  List counties being farmed and to be farmed. This must match the producer data report from Farm Programs. You must have agreements in place for these farms between you and the landowner.

items.name: Acres Owned
items.comment: Part F 2:  Enter the total number of acre(s) you own. If none, enter 0.

items.name: Acres Rented
items.comment: Part F 3:  Enter the total number of acre(s) rented or leased in all counties farmed. If none, enter 0.

items.name: Purpose of Loan
items.comment: Part F  4(A)   Indicate whether this will be an operating or farm ownership loan.   Will you be purchasing livestock, equipment, or real estate? Do you need an annual operating loan? To pay seed, taxes, insurance, etc. You will need an annual operating loan. Do you need to purchase equipment or livestock? You will need an operating loan. Do you need to purchase real estate? You will need a Farm Ownership loan. You are able to request more than one loan. If so, please put you first loan request in 4A and your second loan request in 5A. You are able to request an OL and FO loan at the same time. You are also able to request an annual OL and term OL at the same time.

items.name: Amount Requested
items.comment: Part F - 4b How much are you requesting?  How much is it going to cost you to accomplish 5a?   Put a specific amount by type of loan you are requesting.

items.name: Description
items.comment: Part F 5:  Are you farming more than one county? Do you have more than one employee?Describe where all your farming income is coming from. Describe all farming enterprises. Describe if you are under forward contracting. Describe if you are under custom heifer raising, steer contracts. Describe the number of full time and/or part time employees. Describe any transitional/seasonal farming income (i. e. beekeeping operation).

items.name: Life Story
items.comment: Part F 6:  Describe the training, farm experience, etc. for the type of operation you are requesting to finance.

items.name: Yes/No Question #1
items.comment: Part G 1:  Check "YES" if you ever conducted business under any other name, otherwise check "NO".  If "YES" provide the names used in Item 8.

items.name: Yes/No Question #2
items.comment: Part G 2:  Check "YES" if you ever obtained a direct or guaranteed farm loan from FSA or the Farmers Home Administration; otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #3
items.comment: Part G 3:   If item 2 is "YES," check "YES" if the government ever forgave any debt through write-down, write-off, compromise, adjustment, reduction, charge-off, paying a loss on a guarantee, or bankruptcy.  If "YES," provide details in Item 8, otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #4
items.comment: Part G 4:  Check "YES" if you are delinquent on any federal debt (i.e. "Federal Debt" includes but is not limited to education loans, delinquent taxes, obligations to Natural Resources Conservation Service, obligations to FCIC, etc., or have an outstanding Federal judgment).  If "YES", provide details in Item 9, otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #5
items.comment: Part G 5:  Check "YES" if you are involved in any pending litigation i.e. divorce, law suit, etc..  If "YES" provide details in Item 8, otherwise check "NO".

items.name: Yes/No Question #6
items.comment: Part G 6:  Check "YES" if you have ever been in receivership, been discharged, or filed a petition for reorganization in bankruptcy.  If "YES" provide details in Item 8; otherwise check "NO."

items.name: Yes/No Question #7
items.comment: Part G 7:  Check "YES" if you are an employee, related to an employee, or closely associated with an employee of the Farm Service Agency.  If "YES" provide details in Item 8, otherwise check "NO."

items.name: Additional Answers
items.comment: Part G 8:  Provide explanations to an "YES" responses to Items 1-7. Use additional space as needed.

items.name: Initials
items.comment: Enter applicant's initials.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Date the applicant completed this form.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Initials
items.comment: Date the applicant completed this form.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Enter applicant's initials.  All applicants must initial and date each page of the application to be considered complete.

items.name: Applicant Signatures
items.comment: Part 17 A:  Signature is a distinctive way as a form of identification on a document to authorize their true certification.   All entity members who apply should sign the Form FSA-2001 as individuals. They must indicate this by checking the "Self" box. The entity member who has the authority to sign on behalf of the entity as the "authorized entity representative" will need to sign on behalf of them self and on behalf of the entity (sign and check both boxes). They will need to sign as "Self" and sign as an "Entity Representative".   The members that do not have the authority to sign on behalf of the entity will only sign as themselves (check the "Self" box).  Part 17 A - B:  Signature is a distinctive way as a form of identification on a document to authorize their true certification.   All entity members who apply should sign the Form FSA-2001 as individuals. They must indicate this by checking the "Self" box. The entity member who has the authority to sign on behalf of the entity as the "authorized entity representative" will need to sign on behalf of them self and on behalf of the entity (sign and check both boxes). They will need to sign as "Self" and sign as an "Entity Representative".   The members that do not have the authority to sign on behalf of the entity will only sign as themselves (check the "Self" box).

items.name: Dates Signed
items.comment: Part 17 C:  Enter the specific month, date and year the applicant has completed and signed the form.

items.name: Date Form FSA-2330 Received
items.comment: Part H 1:  FSA USE ONLY: The date the application was received, and date stamped by the office. Part H 1:  FSA USE ONLY: The date the application was received, and date stamped by the office.

items.name: Date Application Complete
items.comment: Part H 3:  FSA USE ONLY: The credit report fee is for pulling your credit report. The fee depends on how the applicant applies.

items.name: Credit Report Fee
items.comment: Part H 4:  FSA USE ONLY: The date the credit report fee was received.

items.name: Date Received
items.comment: Part H 5:  FSA USE ONLY: Name of the person who received the application and credit report fee.

parts.name: Part A
parts.title: Waiver Request
parts.description: FSA may waive the financial and/or production training requirements if the applicant has:  (1) Successfully completed a financial management training program or has sufficient practical experience including a demonstrated ability to keep records. Applicant must submit evidence of having completed a similar course as those approved by FSA, including description of content and subjects covered in the course, grade received, or certificate of completion or information related to their practical experience. Information previously submitted (such as college transcripts and list of training courses previously completed) does not need to be resubmitted.   (2) Experience and/or training which demonstrates the abilities necessary for successful and efficient production. Applicant must submit, at a minimum, production records for the past 3 years and explain how the production records demonstrate production ability. Subsequent waiver requests may utilize information on file and previously submitted information does not need to be resubmitted.

items.name: Exact Full Legal Name
items.comment: Part A 1a - Enter your full legal name, on individuals first name, middle name and last name without the use of initials or nicknames. If this is an entity, enter the entity name.

items.name: Financial Management Training Waiver
items.comment: Part A 1b - Enter a check mark in the box if you are requesting a waiver of the financial management borrower training requirement.  Financial management - It means applying general management principles to financial resources of the enterprise.

items.name: Production Borrower Training Waiver
items.comment: Part A 1c - Enter check mark in the box if you are requesting a waiver of the production borrower training requirement.  Production Management - Production management also deals with decision-making regarding the quality, quantity, cost, etc., of production.

items.name: Attached Document Indicator
items.comment: Part A 1d- Attach documentation of previous training and/or experience you have received to support the request for waiver for each training.  You are not required to submit information you have previously submitted to FSA. This information remains in your file.  If there have been changes to this information, submit only the information that has changed.

items.name: Description for Waiver Justification
items.comment: Part A 1e - List appropriate training courses completed and/or provide and account of related experience you have.  You are not required to submit information you have previously submitted to FSA, this information remains in your file.  If there have been changes to this information, submit only thing information that has changed.

items.name: Signature
items.comment: Part 2a - Signature is a distinctive way as a form of identification on a document to authorize their true certification. Enter the applicant's signature.    Applicant will sign only if requesting a waiver.  This is a dual-purpose form.  If the form is being used only to record FSA's assessment of the applicant's previous waiver or training (Part B, item 3C and D ), then applicant does not need to sign.

items.name: Date
items.comment: Part 2 b - Enter the specific month, day, and year the applicant has completed and signed the form.

items.name: FSA's Waiver Request Decision
items.comment: Part 3a -If the applicant has met the requirements for financial and/or production, please check the "Approved" box.   If the applicant has not met the requirements for financial and/or production, please check the "Denied" box.

items.name: Reason for Denial
items.comment: Part B 3b- If denied, please enter a reason for denial.

items.name: FSA's Assessment of Previous Waiver and Completed Training
items.comment: Part B 3c- If additional training is not required, the prior waiver remains valid.  Check in item 3c and explain in 3d
